title: Abram Besicovitch
summary: Abram Samoilovitch Besicovitch (or Besikovitch)[1] (Russian: Абра́м Само́йлович Безико́вич; 23 January 1891 – 2 November 1970) was a Russian mathematician, who worked mainly in England. He was born in Berdyansk on the Sea of Azov (now in Ukraine) to a Karaite Jewish family.[4][5][6][7][8][9][10]
